message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper deals with recommendation systems and collaborative filtering, which are topics commonly studied in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of text reviews to understand user motivations suggests a connection to Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Finally, the Bayesian modeling approach and the use of Poisson distributions may also relate to Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS).
